article_title: “Don’t b*tch”: Watch your feisty elders dispense life advice in this amazing Dodge Super Bowl ad
article_text:
Topics: Advertisements, commercials, Dodge, Super Bowl 2015, Super Bowl commercials, Video, Media News, Entertainment News

Car commercial themes have run the gamut during this Super Bowl, as they’re wont to do. However, there has been a trend away from the flashy (Lexus) toward the sentimental (Nissan, Toyota, etc.).

Dodge, however figured out how to meld the two. With a subtle shift in tone, an awesome cast of elderly folks, and some well-steered advice the advertisement manipulated our emotions from nostalgic to engine roaring. Well played, Dodge. Hear the advice below:
